CustomField.description: For Athletic Revision, Manual Override or Test Score Rescinded, enter the new Award Amount. For Late Adjust, enter the amount to be ADDED to the existing Merit Award Amount.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Athletic Revision, Manual Override or Test Score Rescinded, enter the new Award Amount. For Late Adjust, enter the amount to be ADDED to the existing Merit Award Amount.
CustomField.label: Award Amount - Manual Override
